verses.verse: And the third <S%G5154><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> there was a marriage <S%G1062><s%> in Cana <S%G2580><s%> of Galilee; <S%G1056><s%> and the mother <S%G3384><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was there: <S%G1563><s%>
And both <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was called, <S%G2564><s%> and his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> to the marriage. <S%G1062><s%>
And when they wanted <S%G5302><s%> wine, <S%G3631><s%> the mother <S%G3384><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, They have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> wine. <S%G3631><s%>
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to her, Woman, <S%G1135><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> have I to do with you? my <S%G3450><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> is not yet <S%G3768><s%> come. <S%G2240><s%>
His mother <S%G3384><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to the servants, <S%G1249><s%> Whatever <S%G3748><s%> <S%G302><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> to you, do <S%G4160><s%> it.

And there were set <S%G2749><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> six <S%G1803><s%> water pots <S%G5201><s%> of stone, <S%G3035><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the manner of the purifying <S%G2512><s%> of the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> containing <S%G5562><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> firkins <S%G3355><s%> apiece. <S%G303><s%>
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Fill <S%G1072><s%> the water pots <S%G5201><s%> with water. <S%G5204><s%> And they filled <S%G1072><s%> them up to the brim. <S%G507><s%>
And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Draw <S%G501><s%> out now, <S%G3568><s%> and bear <S%G5342><s%> to the governor <S%G755><s%> of the feast. <S%G755><s%> And they bore <S%G5342><s%> it.

When <S%G5613><s%> the ruler <S%G755><s%> of the feast <S%G755><s%> had tasted <S%G1089><s%> the water <S%G5204><s%> that was made <S%G1096><s%> wine, <S%G3631><s%> and knew <S%G1492><s%> not from where <S%G4159><s%> it was: (but the servants <S%G1249><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> drew <S%G501><s%> the water <S%G5204><s%> knew; <S%G1492><s%>) the governor <S%G755><s%> of the feast <S%G755><s%> called <S%G5455><s%> the bridegroom, <S%G3566><s%>

And said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%> at <S%G4412><s%> the beginning <S%G4412><s%> does set <S%G5087><s%> forth <S%G5087><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> wine; <S%G3631><s%> and when <S%G3752><s%> men have well <S%G3184><s%> drunk, <S%G3184><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> that which is worse: <S%G1640><s%> but you have kept <S%G5083><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> now. <S%G737><s%>

This <S%G5026><s%> beginning <S%G746><s%> of miracles <S%G4592><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> in Cana <S%G2580><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and manifested <S%G5319><s%> forth <S%G5319><s%> his glory; <S%G1391><s%> and his disciples <S%G3101><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him.

After <S%G3326><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> he went <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> to Capernaum, <S%G2584><s%> he, and his mother, <S%G3384><s%> and his brothers, <S%G80><s%> and his disciples: <S%G3101><s%> and they continued <S%G3306><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> not many <S%G4183><s%> days. <S%G2250><s%>
And the Jews' <S%G2453><s%> passover <S%G3957><s%> was at <S%G1451><s%> hand, <S%G1451><s%> and Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G305><s%> up to Jerusalem. <S%G2414><s%>

And found <S%G2147><s%> in the temple <S%G2411><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> that sold <S%G4453><s%> oxen <S%G1016><s%> and sheep <S%G4263><s%> and doves, and the changers <S%G2773><s%> of money <S%G2773><s%> sitting: <S%G2521><s%>

And when he had made <S%G4160><s%> a whip <S%G5416><s%> of small <S%G4979><s%> cords, <S%G4979><s%> he drove <S%G1544><s%> them all <S%G3956><s%> out of the temple, <S%G2411><s%> and the sheep, <S%G4263><s%> and the oxen; <S%G1016><s%> and poured <S%G1632><s%> out the changers' <S%G2855><s%> money, <S%G2772><s%> and overthrew <S%G390><s%> the tables; <S%G5132><s%>

And said <S%G2036><s%> to them that sold <S%G4453><s%> doves, <S%G4058><s%> Take <S%G142><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things hence; <S%G1782><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> not my Father's <S%G3962><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> an house <S%G3624><s%> of merchandise. <S%G1712><s%>
And his disciples <S%G3101><s%> remembered <S%G3415><s%> that it was written, <S%G1125><s%> The zeal <S%G2205><s%> of your <S%G4675><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> has eaten <S%G2719><s%> me up.

Then <S%G3767><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, What <S%G5101><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> show <S%G1166><s%> you to us, seeing that you do <S%G4160><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things?

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Destroy <S%G3089><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> temple, <S%G3485><s%> and in three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> I will raise <S%G1453><s%> it up.

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> Forty <S%G5062><s%> and six <S%G1803><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> was this <S%G3778><s%> temple <S%G3485><s%> in building, <S%G3618><s%> and will you raise <S%G1453><s%> it up in three <S%G5140><s%> days? <S%G2250><s%>
But he spoke <S%G3004><s%> of the temple <S%G3485><s%> of his body. <S%G4983><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> he was risen <S%G1453><s%> from the dead, <S%G3498><s%> his disciples <S%G3101><s%> remembered <S%G3415><s%> that he had said <S%G3004><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> to them; and they believed <S%G4100><s%> the scripture, <S%G1124><s%> and the word <S%G3056><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had said. <S%G2036><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> he was in Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the passover, <S%G3957><s%> in the feast <S%G1859><s%> day, many <S%G4183><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> in his name, <S%G3686><s%> when they saw <S%G2334><s%> the miracles <S%G4592><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he did. <S%G4160><s%>
But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> did not commit <S%G4100><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> to them, because <S%G1223><s%> he knew <S%G1097><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men,
And needed <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5532><s%> not that any <S%G5100><s%> should testify <S%G3140><s%> of man: <S%G444><s%> for he knew <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> was in man. <S%G444><s%>
